# ForestUserPrincipalNames

This DSC configuration will manage forest wide settings including User Principal Name (UPN) suffixes, Service Principal Name (SPN) suffixes and tombstone lifetime.

<br />

## Project Information

|                  |                                                                                                                               |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Source**       | https://github.com/bigkhangtheory/ActiveDirectoryTasks/tree/master/ActiveDirectoryTasks/DscResources/ForestUserPrincipalNames |
| **Dependencies** | [ActiveDirectoryDsc][ActiveDirectoryDsc], [xPSDesiredStateConfiguration][xPSDesiredStateConfiguration]                        |
| **Resources**    | [xWindowsFeature][xWindowsFeature]                                                                                            |

<br />

## Parameters

<br />

### Table. Attributes of `ForestUserPrincipalNames`

| Parameter    | Attribute  | DataType   | Description                            | Allowed Values |
| :----------- | :--------- | :--------- | :------------------------------------- | :------------- |
| **DomainDn** | *Required* | `[String]` | Distinguished Name (DN) of the domain. |                |


---

<br />

## Example `ForestUserPrincipalNames`

```yaml
ForestUserPrincipalNames:
  ForestDN: DC=example,DC=com
  UserPrincipalNameSuffixToAdd:
    - example.com
  Credential: "[]"
```

<br />

## Lookup Options in Datum.yml

```yaml
lookup_options:

  ForestUserPrincipalNames:
    merge_hash: deep

```
